about_the_game:
Bringing six of the most powerful divisions from Steel Division: Normandy 44 to the battlefields of the Eastern Front in Steel Division 2. The Tribute to D-Day expansion commemorates the start of Operation Overlord spectacularly!

This Steel Division 2 DLC brings:

  • Six original Steel Division: Normandy 44 divisions, three for both the Allies and Axis. All playable in solo, cooperative, and online multiplayer in Steel Division 2.
  • Troops from four nations, including Polish, American, British and German. Command U.S. Rangers, Polish tankers, elite Fallschirmjägers or British Airborne infantry.
  • A comeback of fan-favorite units: M18 Hellcat tank destroyers, Cromwell and Tetrarch tanks, “Beute” Firefly tank, and more!

New Divisions

Six new divisions are at your command. Which one will you choose?

  • American 2nd Infantry Division “Indianhead” - Locked in hedgerow hell for months, the “Indianhead” soldiers became close combat experts.
  • British 6th Airborne Division - The Red Devils were first to land on French soil during the daring glider attack at Pegasus Bridge.
  • Polish 1st Armored Division - The Winged Hussars faced off against tough opponents, with the Poles playing a crucial role in closing the Falaise Pocket.
  • German 17. SS-Panzergrenadier-Division - The Volksdeutsche from the mechanized “Götz von Berlichingen” division proved themselves under fire, wreaking havoc on the Allies with their low-profile StuGs.
  • German 3. Fallschirmjäger-Division - The elite paratroopers of the Grüne Teufel division excelled in bocage country with their large arsenal of automatic infantry weapons.
  • German The 12. SS-Panzerdivision “Hitlerjugend” - Arguably one of the best fighting formations of the Third Reich, these fanatical soldiers proved a tough nut to crack in Normandy.

Return of popular units

The Steel Division 2’s Tribute to D-Day DLC introduces a host of fan-favorite units from Division: Normandy 44.

Be prepared to play with:

  • The M18 Hellcat tank destroyer
  • Several variants of the Cromwell cruiser tank
  • Several variants of the Tetrarch light tank
  • Xylophone rocket launcher, T30 HMC
  • M4A1 Rhino, Crusader AA Mk, Centaur IV
  • Panzer L6(i), BEF.SPW 202(e), “Beute” Firefly
  • Elite Infantry units: Fallschirmjägers, U.S. Rangers, British Airborne

legal_notice: Developed and published by Eugen Systems.
name: Steel Division 2 - Tribute to D-Day Pack

package_groups.name: default

subs.option_text: Steel Division 2 - Tribute to D-Day Pack - $16.99 USD

package_groups.title: Buy Steel Division 2 - Tribute to D-Day Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: Intel Celeron G4920 (Legacy: i3-2100) , AMD Athlon 200GE
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 1030 (Legacy: Nvidia GeForce GTS 450), AMD Radeon RX 460 (Legacy: ATI Radeon HD 5570)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: 64-bit Windows 10 / 8.1 / 7 with Service Pack 1
  • Processor: 4 cores Intel | AMD CPU (Intel i3-8100, AMD Ryzen 3 1200)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3 GB (Legacy: Nvidia Geforce GTX 780), AMD Radeon RX 580 (Legacy: AMD Radeon R9 290X)
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card

short_description: Celebrate Operation Overlord with the Steel Division 2 DLC: Tribute to D-Day. The expansion brings 6 divisions from Steel Division: Normandy 44, including the Polish 1st Armored Division and 3. Fallschirmjäger-Division. Play with units such as the M18 Hellcat, Cromwell, “Beute” Firefly and more!
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
